MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm to carry out a permanent repair to our underground cable network following a power cut earlier today. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00pm on 12th October 2020.
